knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE)

```{r load-packages}
library(leaflet)
library(magrittr)
library(DT)
```

```{r read-data}
pizza <- jsonlite::fromJSON(
    here::here('data', 'FavoriteSpots.json')
) %>% 
    tidyr::unnest()
```

# First Page

## Left Column

### Table

```{r pizza-table}
datatable(pizza, rownames=FALSE, 
          elementId='PizzaTable'
)
```


## Right Column

### Map

```{r pizza-the-map}
leaflet(data=pizza, elementId='PizzaMap') %>% 
    addTiles() %>% 
    addMarkers(
        lng = ~ longitude, 
        lat = ~ latitude,
        popup = ~ Name
    )
```
